# HousingVsRenting

<!-- badges: start -->

<!-- badges: end -->

Based Khan Academy videos  
   https://www.khanacademy.org/economics-finance-domain/core-finance/housing#renting-v-buying

Data:  
   https://www.khanacademy.org/downloads/buyrent.xls
  
## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("rkuttner7/HousingVsRenting")
```

Windows users also must first install [Rtools](http://cran.rstudio.com/bin/windows/Rtools/).

<br>  
  

## Getting help

If you encounter a clear bug, please file a minimal reproducible example on [github](https://github.com/rkuttner7/HousingVsRenting/issues).
